author: ahinzmann
body:
This is usually activated in:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_7_4_X/RecoJets/Configuration/python/RecoPFJets_cff.py#L38
However, if people pick up the original cfis for the jet producers, the end up with jets without area computed and wrong L1 jet energy corrections applied.
This pull request is to avoid this very frequent bug once and for all.

This PR has no effect on RECO/AOD/MiniAOD, since there fastjet area computation is already activated.
title: Enable fastjet area computation by default
